name: EventStatusEffectUpdate
description: This event is fired when a status effect (potion effect) is added or removed from the player.
overview:
Backed by class `EventStatusEffectUpdate`.

## Event payload

| Field | Type | Description |
|---|---|---|
| `oldEffect` | `StatusEffectHelper` | The previous effect state (can be null when added) |
| `newEffect` | `StatusEffectHelper` | The new effect state (can be null when removed) |
| `added` | `boolean` | True if effect was added, false if removed |

## Behavior

* Fires when any status effect is added or removed
* Not cancellable
* Useful for effect tracking and automation

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the event object.
